original_text: The great city was split into three parts, and the cities of the nations fell, and God remembered Babylon the great, to make her drain the cup of the wine of the fury of his wrath.
korean_text: 큰 성이 세 갈래로 갈라지고 만국의 성들도 무너지니 큰 성 바벨론이 하나님 앞에 기억하신 바 되어 그의 맹렬한 진노의 포도주 잔을 받으매

sentences.original_text: The great city was split into three parts
sentences.korean_translation: 그 큰 성은 세 부분으로 나뉘었습니다

sentences.original_text: and the cities of the nations fell
and God remembered Babylon the great
to make her drain the cup
of the wine of the fury of his wrath
